install.name: Simple Image Gallery Plugin
install.author: Fotis Evangelou - George Chouliaras (JoomlaWorks)

param.name: th_width
param.label: Image thumbnail width
param.description: Adjust the maximum image thumbnail width in pixels.

param.name: th_height
param.label: Image thumbnail height
param.description: Adjust the maximum image thumbnail height in pixels.

param.name: th_quality
param.label: Image thumbnail quality
param.description: Adjust the quality of the generated image thumbnail. Values range from 0 to 100, with 100 giving the best possible result. Values between 60 to 70 should be OK, too! Remember: the lower this value is, the lower the size of the generated thumbnail will be.

param.name: displaynavtip
param.label: Should we display a navigation tip for the slideshow?
param.description: If set to yes, the tip you enter below will display in the popup window containing the image.

param.name: navtip
param.default: Navigation tip: Hover mouse on top of the right or left side of the image to see the next or previous image respectively.
param.label: Popup window navigation tip message
param.description: Insert here the text that will be displayed on the preview popup window, next to the content item title. Valid only if the above setting is set to 'Yes'.

param.name: displaymessage
param.label: Should we display a nice message?
param.description: If set to yes, the message you enter below will display in the popup window containing the image, along with the content item's title. If set to no, then the filename of the image will only be displayed.

param.name: message
param.default: You are browsing images from the article:
param.label: Popup window message
param.description: Insert here the text that will be displayed on the preview popup window, next to the content item title. Valid only if the above setting is set to 'Yes'.
